Roid Ragin.description: +{ Total STR. 'Total' here means that, for example, a +10% STR bonus from something else wouldn't affect this bonus.

Warriors Rule.description: All Orange Passive Bubbles, which are the smaller sized ones, give a {x higher bonus to your warrior-based classes.

Hearty Diggy.description: +{% mining efficiency per power of 10 max HP that your character has. The perfect bonus for miners with infinite HP!

Wyoming Blood.description: Multi-Ore mining chance is increased by +{%, and your max Multi-Ore chance is 300% instead of 100%.

Reely Smart.description: +{% Mining and Fishing EXP gain. Y'know what, I'll even DOUBLE that bonus for whichever skill has the lower level!

Big Meaty Claws.description: Increases base damage by +$. This bonus increases based on how much Max HP you have above 250.

Sploosh Sploosh.description: Multi-Fish fishing chance is increased by +{%, and your max Multi-Fish chance is 300% instead of 100%.

Stronk Tools.description: The following tools give +{% more skilling Power than normal: $

Fmj.description: +{% more defence from Equipment. Also, +1 base Def per Class LV, up to +{.

Bappity Boopity.description: +{% critical Damage. Badabing, badaboom! Or in Italian, Babadabinga, babadaboomahh!

Brittley Spears.description: +{% Total damage. This multiplies with other damage bonuses, but adds with the other '+% Total Damage' bubbles.

Call Me Bob.description: +{% Construction EXP Gain. Also gives +50% Bug-Fixing speed if your username is LavaFlame2. Actually, better make that +500%...

Buff Boi Talent.description: +{ Talent Points for EACH tab! Yea, it's amazing right? But it's just for warriors, don't tell the other classes!!

Orange Bargain.description: The material costs of ALL orange bubbles are {% lower

Penny Of Strength.description: +{% Cash from Monsters for every 250 STR. The pennies reflect your strength in themselves, thus making them more valuable!

Multorange.description: The following orange bubbles give {x higher bonus than what they display: I, III, IV, VI, XII

Dream Of Ironfish.description: +{% Mining and Fishing AFK GAINS rate. Wow, how bias can you get... giving the warrior's bubble TWO afk gain bonuses.

Shimmeron.description: +{% Gold Food Effect. Go on, its ok, I won't be offended. No seriously, go upgrade something else, I know I'm not a good upgrade...

Bite But Not Chew.description: +{% Food Non-Consume chance. Also, if your capped Non-Consume chance happens to be 98%, this changes it to 99%!

Swift Steppin.description: +{ Total AGI. Probably the lamest of the five stats... err, I mean four, hehe.

Archer Or Bust.description: All Green Passive Bonuses, which are the smaller sized ones, give {x more bonuses to your archer-based characters.

Hammer Hammer.description: You can now produce +1 more items at once in the anvil, and your production speed is increased by {%.

Lil Big Damage.description: +{% Mastery. Mastery is your stat that boosts minimum damage. Just like in Maplest... err, just like how I thought it up myself!

Anvilnomics.description: Costs for buying Anvil Production Points is reduced by {%. This is just like a tax cut, so remember me as a hero!

Quick Slap.description: Increases base damage by +$. This bonus increases based on how much Movement Speed you have above 110%.

Sanic Tools.description: The following tools give +{% more skilling Power than normal: $

Bug].description: Multi-Bug catching chance is increased by +{%, and your max Multi-Bug chance is 300% instead of 100%.

Shaquracy.description: Your secondary stat (WIS for warrior, STR for archer, AGI for mage) gives +{% more Accuracy than normal.

Cheap Shot.description: +{% critical Chance, as it increases the chance for your attack to hit the monster's privates, and for the monster to be male.

Bow Jack.description: +{% Total damage. This multiplies with other damage bonuses, but adds with the other '+% Total Damage' bubbles.

Cuz I Catch Em All.description: {x more likely to catch shiny critters when opening a trap.

Fast Boi Talent.description: +{ Talent Points for EACH tab, but just for Archers! Well, and 'that' class, you know who you are!

Green Bargain.description: The material costs of ALL green bubbles are {% lower

Dollar Of Agility.description: +{% Cash from Monsters for every 250 AGI. The extra agility allows the dollars to stretch in size and increase in value!

Premigreen.description: The following green bubbles give {x higher bonus than what they display: I, VI, VIII, X, XII

Fly In Mind.description: +{% Catching AFK Gains Rate. Now you too can dream about bugs in your sleep, just like I do all the time!!!!

Kill Per Kill.description: +{% extra Kills for Deathnote and opening portals to new maps. Shoutout to my I.S. players who fondly remember 'Kill Per Kill'!

Afk Expexp.description: +{% chance for Double EXP when claiming AFK gains. You'll know this happens because it literally tells you it happened!

Stable Jenius.description: +{ Total WIS. Honesty the greatest bonus in any Idle Game, believe me. Absolutely incredible, everyone says so!

Mage Is Best.description: All Purple Passive Bonuses, which are the smaller sized ones, give {x more bonuses to your mage-based characters.

Hocus Choppus.description: +{% choppin efficiency per power of 10 max MP that your character has. Super diaper! Err, duper.

Molto Loggo.description: Multi-Log chop chance is increased by +{%, and your max Multi-Log chance is now 300% instead of 100%.

Noodubble.description: +{% Choppin' and Alchemy EXP gain. Y'know what, I'll even... actually, never mind.

Name I Guess.description: Increases base damage by +$. This bonus increases based on how much Max MP you have above 150.

Le Brain Tools.description: The following tools give +{% more skilling Power than normal: $

Cookin Roadkill.description: Cranium Cooking lasts {% longer, gives {% more progress per kill, and has a {% lower cooldown. Also +{% Alchemy EXP!

Brewstachio.description: +{% Brew Speed. This a multiplicative bonus, which means its ultra powerful, all the time! Even on Mondays, the worst day!

All For Kill.description: Attack Talents give +{% higher bonuses to Offline Gains than they normally do. So you might as well just AFK forever, bye!

Matty Stafford.description: +{% Total damage. This multiplies with other damage bonuses, but adds with the other '+% Total Damage' bubbles.

Call Me Pope.description: {x Worship Charge rate per hour. Also, {x Max Worship Charge! You bouta go super with all that charge... just sayin'

Gospel Leader.description: +{% Max Charge per 10 Worship levels. I guess you could say this upgrade doesn't come Free of Charge!

Smart Boi Talent.description: Sorry, mages don't get anything because you're lame.... Ok fine, you can have +{ Talent Points for each tab, but I'm not happy about it.

Purple Bargain.description: The material costs of ALL purple bubbles are {% lower

Nickel Of Wisdom.description: +{% Cash from Monsters for every 250 WIS. Wisdom allows the nickel to trick others into thinking its a Dime, increasing its value!

Severapurple.description: The following purple bubbles give {x higher bonus than what they display: I, III, VI, X, XII

Tree Sleeper.description: +{% Choppin' AFK Gains Rate. Ain't nothin' like sittin' down at the ol' tree and havin' a snooze n' a sleep!

Hyperswift.description: +{% Basic Attack Speed. Just like all other Basic Attack Speed bonuses, this boosts AFK kills/hr if you do enough dmg!

Matrix Evolved.description: +{% Lab EXP Gain. Also +{% ineptitude to face the reality of what's REALLY going on behind the scenes...

Lotto Skills.description: +{ LUK. Also, this will increase your chances of winning the lottery in real life from 0.0% to 0.000%! I'm not even joking, it's true!!

Droppin Loads.description: +{% Drop Rate. Thanks to this upgrade, you can get even MORE angry when you keep not getting that rare pet drop from the boss!

Startue Exp.description: Leveling up a statue resets it's exp bar down to {%, instead of 0%. Staturrific! Yea... the jokes are only gonna go downhill from here lol

Level Up Gift.description: Whenever you level up anything, {% chance to drop a gift! It could be an EXP balloon, a Gem for the gem shop, or something crazy weird!

Prowesessary.description: The Prowess Bonus for every skill is multiplied by {. Prowess lowers the Efficiency needed to get multiple QTY per drop from resources.

Stamp Tramp.description: Increases the Max Lv of the 'Toilet Paper Postage' Talent to {. You can unlock this talent by typing 'More like Poopy Pete' near Pete.

Undeveloped Costs.description: Reduces the material costs of all Alchemy Bubbles by {%. They are just bubbles though, how much could they even cost? 10 dollars?

Da Daily Drip.description: Increases the Max Cap for every liquid by +$. This bonus increases based on the combined Alchemy LV of all your characters!

Grind Time.description: +{% Class EXP. The go-to active bubble for anyone who wants to reach max level faster and finally start playing the game!

Laaarrrryyyy.description: Every time you upgrade an Alchemy bubble, there's a {% chance it'll upgrade 2 times, for no extra cost! Two fer one, getter dun!

Cogs For Hands.description: +{% Cog Production speed. Cogs are great. I really really like cogs. I guess you could say I think they're pretty Coggers...

Sample It.description: +{% Sample Size when taking samples for the 3d printer. Finally, your statisitcal analysis will be accurate!

Big Game Hunter.description: Killing a Giant Monster has a {% chance to not decrease the Giant Mob Spawn Odds, which reset at the end of each week.

Ignore Overdues.description: +{% Book Checkout speed, all thanks to this one little bubble that librarians do NOT want you to know about!

Yellow Bargain.description: The material costs of ALL yellow bubbles are {% lower.

Mr Massacre.description: +{% Multikill per damage tier. Remember, damage tier is shown by the Purple Bar in AFK info, and multikill is bigtime for resources

Egg Ink.description: +{% faster Egg Incubation Time in the Pet Nest. This will be an absolutely VITAL upgrade once you unlock pet egg rarity!

Diamond Chef.description: {x faster Meal and Fire Kitchen Speeds for every Meal at Lv 11+. This is when the meal plate becomes Diamond Blue, just so you know!

Card Champ.description: +{% Card Drop Chance for all card types, even Party Dungeon cards!

Petting The Rift.description: {x New Pet Chance for every gap you traverse in the SpaceTime Rift. The Rift entrance is deep in World 4, far above the 8 armed octodars.

Copper Corona.description: Orange bubble cauldron brew speed is increased by +{%

Sippy Splinters.description: Green bubble cauldron brew speed is increased by +{%

Mushroom Soup.description: Yellow cauldron brew speed is increased by +{%

Spool Sprite.description: Purple cauldron brew speed is increased by +{%

Barium Mixture.description: +{ Water Droplet max capacity. Thats the 1st liquid type in Alchemy, btw.

Skinny 0 Cal.description: +{% chance to get double points when depositing statues. So like... if you deposit one statue, it might count as one! Or two.

Thumb Pow.description: When converting Skill EXP into Class EXP using the 'EXP CONVERTER' star talent, you'll get {% more Class EXP than you usually do.

Jungle Juice.description: +{% liquid regen rate for all liquid cauldrons. Yes, even the secret one!

Barley Brew.description: Alchemy bubble upgrade costs are {% lower for all bubbles! Even the giraffe bubbles that look strangely like elephants!

Anearful.description: +{% Card drop rate. Even works offline, just like it always has! What do you mean this used to say something different...?

Tea With Pea.description: +{ Liquid Nitrogen max capacity. Thats the 2nd liquid type in Alchemy, btw.

Ramificoction.description: +{ Talent Points for Tab 1. Shout out to that 1 person who'll make it this far without knowing what talents are, you're my hero!

Seawater.description: +{% chance for 1 kill to count for 2 when trying to open new portals, but only while actively playing. One, two, buckle my shoe.

Tail Time.description: +{ Weapon Power. This is gonna be OP in later worlds I can already tell.

Fly In My Drink.description: Eww go get me another one, I can't drink this! ...what, why are you looking at me like that? OH right, uh, this gives +{ base Accuracy.

Mimicraught.description: +{% EXP from monsters. Sorry, I know this is a lame bonus. Send me an email if you want me change it to +{% NPC dialogue talking speed.

Blue Flav.description: -{% material cost for stamps. You know how it's hard to increase stamps max levels? Well this kinda makes that a bit less factual!

Slug Slurp.description: +{ Post Office Box Points for every character, and easily the best bonus in the game. A box will never abandon you!

Pickle Jar.description: +{% Nothing. Absolutely nothing, now and forever. It's a darn pickle, what were you expecting?

Fur Refresher.description: +{% higher Shiny Critter chance. This is a multiplier, so +1% from this vial means 1.01x, so 5% shiny chance would go to 5.05%.

Crab Juice.description: +{ Starting points in Worship Tower Defence. Of course, a true balloon monkey wouldn't accept handouts like this.

Red Malt.description: +{% Refinery Cycle Speed. I just want to see you squirm a bit more as you decide where to spend your precious salts hahahaha!!

Poison Tincture.description: Eagle Eye Trap-O-Vision gives +{% more critters. It will always give less than if you manually collected the traps though.

Bubonic Burp.description: +{ Cog Inventory spaces. DONT PANIC!!! I KNOW ITS ALARMING THAT A VIAL FINALLY GIVES A USEFUL BONUS, BUT STAY CALM!

Orange Malt.description: +{% higher Shiny Critter chance. This stacks with the shiny chance from the Fur Refresher vial. You see, they have the same shaped vial.

Snow Slurry.description: +{% Printer sample size. My my there are a lot of these 'sample size' bonuses in the game... too many...

Slowergy Drink.description: +{% Base Multikill per Multikill Tier for all worlds. Stack them skulls!

40-40 Purity.description: +{ Trench Seawater max capacity. Thats the 3rd liquid type in Alchemy, btw.

Goosey Glug.description: +{ base critter per trap. This is a sHONKingly good bonus, the only one of its kind!

Ball Pickle Jar.description: +{% arcade ball gain rate, and those are balls blessed by Balljoepickle himself, so you know they're extra lucky!

Donut Drink.description: +{% Chance to breed a new pet. Multiplicative, so +5% here would change a 1 in 100 to 1 in 95 chance.

Bloat Draft.description: +{% Lab EXP gain. Strange, you'd think someone dumb enough to drink a bloated blobfish drink wouldn't get bonus lab exp at all...

Pearl Seltzer.description: +{% All Stats. If you don't know what all stats means by now, you've prolly got bigger problems than not knowing what all stats means.

Mediocre Obols.description: 1 random low-quality Obol. Sure, it'll probably be a crappy bronze Obol, but that's not bad considering youre paying with water!

Distilled Water.description: This distilled water was double-purified by running it through thousands of diamonds! So yea, it's just regular water, but more expensive.

One Measly Gem.description: 1 Gem. Perfect for buying things in the Gem Shop! Sponsored by LavaFlame2's Gem Shop; 'Come for the items, leave for the prices!'

Star Book.description: Gives you a Star-Book! It's always the same one, but it comes with a random Max Lv, so keep buying it until you get one with a 100 Lv Max!

Exp Balloon.description: A small exp balloon. They give you exp in whatever skill you're currently training! Using them in town will give EXP in the town skill!

Small Donation.description: Your donation helps starving orphan monsters. They asked for food, but beggars can't be choosers! You wont get anything for doing this.

Decent Obols.description: 1 random low-quality Obol, except this time the 'low' was rated by someone with higher standards, so it's more like medium quality!

Grand Obols.description: 1 random Obol. It could be a super rare gold obol, but it's most likely gonna be a bronze obol.

Bargain Tag.description: Lowers the cost of the next bubble you upgrade by 25%! Can stack multiple times, but max is 90% off.

Dense Water.description: Sourced from the bottom of the Great Trench, dont drink this or you'll become dummy thicc or whatever!

A Pair Of Gems.description: 2 Gems. Thats two steps closer to buying everything in Gem Shop! Sure are a lot of steps for that one though...

Empty Space.description: There's nothing here buddy, but that ain't gon stop me from selling it to ya!
